Don't miss the upcoming session 
If you are having trouble viewing this email view online <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/JwKmCO5ABUE3nlwSvhwhG11Wn?domain=app.info.cignaglobal.com> 	  	  <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bb0866b45-7b1a-4c0e-a929-c9cd7c591ed5%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_pos_rgb.png> 
 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B3303256f-b00c-4698-a011-beae8a8acb3a%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_rev_rgb.png> 
 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B9bb92e7f-2a1e-4455-b3fb-ee5c122e7f9d%7D_cfh_new.png> 	

ConnectForHealth 

Cigna Healthcare's wellbeing series 

 	 
You are invited to join our next ConnectForHealth session: 
Kindness - The Blueprint for Raising Resilient Kids 


Save the date 

 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B6e32d3b1-662c-4f7f-a345-324ca175bb17%7D_calendar_blue_icon.png> 	
Date: 
Wednesday 
June 11 

 	  <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B8d5382ad-38b8-4b08-bcf6-d28255632e74%7D_clock_blue_icon.png> 	
Time: 
11:00 AM - 12:00 PM 
(Gulf Standard Time) 

	

What to expect 

You'll learn about the importance of expressing kindness as well as some simple ways to nurture empathy and emotional intelligence in your children. 

Did you know? 

Children with higher levels of empathy are faster at identifying painful facial expressions1. 

Click here to register <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/oMttCP5BDUJQW9ZU1izhxgo3s?domain=app.info.cignaglobal.com>

chunks.text:
Children with higher levels of empathy are faster at identifying painful facial expressions1. 

Click here to register <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/oMttCP5BDUJQW9ZU1izhxgo3s?domain=app.info.cignaglobal.com> 	

Guest Speaker: Christine Kritzas 

Psychologist - Parenting and Family Services, Director, Lighthouse Arabia 

 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Beea7bc30-c8da-477d-b538-faf5e4294cfb%7D_Christine_Kritzas_CFH.jpeg> 	 	 Christine Kritzas is a psychologist committed to exploring and developing every person’s individuality and unique potential in a collaborative and therapeutic relationship. With over 15 years of experience as a practicing psychologist, she has worked extensively with children and adults, with parents, schools, and within the corporate sector. Additionally, Christine’s creativity and passion for impact is evident in her creation of the innovative brand SmartHeart®. This platform offers an array of products designed for families, educators, and health practitioners, aimed at fostering children’s emotional intelligence. 

Recognized as an influential voice in mental health and wellbeing, Christine regularly contributes her insights on panels and in media outlets, including Gulf News, Khaleej Times, and The National. 

 	 
If you face any problems with registration, please write to us on meacommunications@cigna.com <mailto:meacommunications@cigna.com>
